thread.title: Austin Band "The Mrs." To Perform At The Inaugural Grand Prix Royale on Friday, October 23, 2015

author: cbs8
title: Austin Band "The Mrs." To Perform At The Inaugural Grand Prix Royale on Friday, October 23, 2015
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE The Mrs.
-- Award-Winning Actor Jamie Foxx to Host a Night of Luxury and Entertainment --
AUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Mrs . will be performing at the inaugural Grand Prix Royale on Friday, October 23 rd at the Palm Door , hosted by award-winning actor, musician and comedian Jamie Foxx . The premier Grand Prix event will benefit the RISE School of Austin , the city's first and only school dedicated to early education of children with and without disabilities in an inclusive classroom setting.
"The Grand Prix Royale isn't just about a big party – it's about finding a way to help those in need by joining forces to improve education," said Foxx. "Trust me, I will be challenging everyone in the audience to give back to the children of Austin ."
Founded by drummer Andra Liemandt , The Mrs. is an all-female pop/rock band that creates music that is influential in changing the way women see themselves. Their songs are written to inspire women to believe that they are " Enough ." Soon after going viral, their Magic Mirror video proved to be a transformative experience that initiated a global female empowerment movement, garnering worldwide media coverage.
The band's inspirational message and rising popularity is resonating louder than ever, and both industry and fans alike are taking notice. Their first two hit singles, " Enough " and " You Told Me ," are steadily climbing the charts, placing The Mrs. in the Top 30 on the Billboard Adult Contemporary radio charts alongside such acts as Madonna, Maroon 5, Meghan Trainor , Fall Out Boy, and Imagine Dragons, among others. The Mrs. "Enough" EP is currently available on iTunes. For additional information, visit www.themrs.com .
Partnering with The Zella Company for design, production and execution of this event will set the bar for the future Grand Prix events in Austin and around the world. The Prime Experiences team has a combined experience of over thirty years dedicated to creating unique experiences combining glamour, sophistication, elegance and excitement.
A-list celebrities, Formula 1 personalities, key influencers and local Austin business leaders will be treated to an exquisite VIP event including bottle service, open bar, entertainment and food, and a charity auction supporting RISE School of Austin.
For tickets and additional information, visit www.grandprixroyale.com .
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/austin-band-the-mrs-to-perform-at-the-inaugural-grand-prix-royale-on-friday-october-23-2015-300162613.html
